title: [Wizard Guild, Court]
description: Light dances along the sheer rock wall from torches set in roughly carved red-veined marble sconces that flank a pair of massive iron doors.  In the dark the ruddy glow coming from behind the doors is obvious.  The sharp scent of sulphur from somewhere beyond stings your nose.

A pair of massive iron doors are set in the sheer rock wall.  The sharp scent of sulphur from somewhere beyond stings your nose.  Torches in roughly carved red-veined marble sconces flank the entrance, their bright flames almost obscuring the ruddy glow showing from somewhere behind the doors.
